title: Cheaters
review:
Hello,
Greetings of the day!!!

How come and which basis you have rejected my refund for this iteam??
I have placed a refund request because the item was missing from the box when I opened it.
You have given the due date as 21st I received no call from your side till that day. 
Than I called you guys on 20th and your educative told me that you will be getting a response within 24 hours.
Again there was no response from your side.
As I was traveling to my home town after 21st I have requested a call back or email for the same.
And now without any response you guys rejected my request.
I want mat full refund otherwise we will meet in consumer forum with all details.
Thanks for your wonderful support Flipkart!!!!!

title: Mind-blowing purchase
review:
Ordered Vivo V7plus few days back .The front 24MP selfie camera does a great job even  in low light conditions so it will not let you down. It camera has features like-Bookeh mode, HDR, Group selfie,Face beauty
The beauty mode  also works when you are in a video call. Guess i don't have think too much while making or recieving a video call now.
Phone runs smoothly and gives no heating problem. Battery life is also good.
Highly recommended.

title: A must buy phone!
review:
So I really liked VIVO V7 Plus and I wanted to divide my review in 5 segments:- 

TECHNICAL- This phone has a 64-bit architecture which enhances the functioning of its 4GB RAM and boosts it even more. 

CAMERA- The 24 MP camera produces smooth & accurate bokeh effect that looks natural and realistic blurring. It also has PDAF which focuses really quickly.

BUILD- The unibody design and gorilla glass v3.0 screen overall give you a really premium feel when you hold it.

SCREEN- It has an HD Plus screen which is crisp and clear to watch anything even in daylight.

BATTERY - Its 3225 mah Battery lasts long even after my slightly heavy usage.

OVERALL- A must buy phone if you want performance and premium feel in the best price.

title: Amazing Device
review:
So I recently ordered a VIVO V7 Plus, Amazing Device I must say. Loved the camera I.e. 24 MP along with Portrait Mode which actually beautifies the face and the output is comparable. The phone is really handy to use even though it has a 5.99 screen size.
The face recognition feature is good UNLOCKED MY PHONE IN SECONDS. So I have ordered a Gold color which is really attractive and works really fast because of the 4GB RAM, plus it is also providing a Game Mode which makes it so much more fun and easier to load high-end games, which gets better with a good battery backup i.e. 3055mAh (can be operated for approximately 24 hours). Apart from that the video calls have added an additional feature of Beauty Effect which i guess is still not there in many brands.

title: Good quality product
review: hi guys...this review of vivo v7 plus my mobile after using 4days....display is brilliant but not excellent... 720p.   battery is great....vivo given 5v charger was pretty good....1.5 hours to take full charge....no lag...no heating problem... touch is very smooth...fingerprint scanner is excellent... external speaker is very loud....now i m coming to camera front camera was outstanding....rear camera was  average...4gb ram....64gb phone memory plus sd card...vivo did great job....mobile was excellent not outstanding... display is fresh and new look....u want great looking phone then this is for u.....price is high...i think 18000rs is perfect for this device...i given 4/5...

title: Amazing product
review: Vivo V7+ supports face recognition unlock sensor which is unique in itself, it takes very less time to detect my face and the overall experience is great. The Hifi music enhances the music quality and provides a great experience while listening to the music. The 24MP selfie camera with moonlight flash gives great quality pictures even in very low light conditions. Even it has a 5.99 inches screen size its very handy and comfortable to use and carry.

title: Does the job
review:
3 star for flipkart's better service..now lets hv review..
vivo V7+ has some features better and some worst...
betters are..1-camera's quality..
2-looks of 5.99 inch display in size of 5.5 inch phone is attractive..
3-no hybrid slot..ie memory card +2 sim also at same time.
4-energetic blue color on back pannel looks good.
5-sreen shot's function is very good. bt while taking long screen shot,all pages are joint to each other..at joint something cuts/missing of one ..and it looks like pages are joint ..not looks like pages are one after another
worst are...
1-high price with least quality..
2- 4 GB Ram is only to talk in news and advertisement..bt not in use...i think ram is only 2.5 or 3 GB..
3-although IPS display is better than TFT bt i think in this price amoled should b provided..
4-typing keyboard is worst not as good as in  Samsung phn.
5-Dialing pad is also worst..nor as smooth nor looks as in samsung phn..and no video calling option in dialpad like samsung phn..
6-it is 5.99 display bt it is fake..it is only 5.7 display because u can use or see videos in only 5.7.
7-it is not fast working as given in advertisement...
8-according to price battery hv no quality ..
9-slow charging ...
10-very difficult to operate in sunny day.. function are app or anything doesnt look clear your face ...it feels that it works like mirror.
11-doesnt support standby 4G sim.. anyone works in 4G and other less than 4G..
12-everyone feels very happy if buys a new phone bt due to very low quality and high price every one will feel only hate...
so in my openion dont buy this phone..only waste of money..plz buy moto..lenovo...honor..etc..

title: Don't waste your money
review:
If there is a way i could give it a 0 start trust me i would have. If you have anything abhove 15k in your pocket this is not the phone you wanna wate your money at. The phone UI lags and thats very irritating. Camera is ok not the greatest as the Vivo has been bragging about. My experience has been horrible with this one. 

i created a return request but they rejected my request without even giving me a call. Customer support is not supportive at all so dnt waste your time calling them. 

Conclusion: Dnt make the mistake i did. I watsed my money and if even one person will chnage there decision after reading this review i will feel my tym writing this was worth spent.

Alternatives: Honor 7x(if you want a bazeless phone or wait for Mi 5) , Mi A1 (great camera for bokeh effect) , Moto G5 plus (well  balanced phone)

title: Could be way better
review:
Hardware: this phone is bit expensive under this range you may purchase phone of other company within same segment under almost half of the price. Vivo have a different definition of white colour, you may the screen colour with a different phone, my eyes are not comfortable with these colour.
Software: there software Android version is very immature like you will not get a notification of emails like Outlook, Zoho Mail, or any third party application if this application will get closed. I had confirmed this with the support team I got an email regarding that

Conclusion: I don't feel buying this phone is a wise decision. I will never advice to buy this phone. Their support team and service centre or not in good condition where you could expect proper response and resolution.

title: Vivo V7+ Good looking
review: Got this mobile in one day after booking. Excellent and prompt delivery by flipkart.  Excellent look. Very handy inspite of 5.99 inch screen and light weight. 4G dual sim with separate SD card slot is really usable. Got good quality light weight transparent back cover in box with pre installed screen protector. Good call quality and audio sound. Screen resolution ok. Very good front camera.Only draw back is slow charging. Overall good value for money.

title: Worst Flipkart service.
review: Please do not buy this product in flipkart. Camera quality was very bad when i got this product and on the very same day i raised a return request to replace the product. It's more than 10 days now the product is still not replaced nor the refund is provided. Flipkart service is very bad. Do not trust their replacement policy , it will never happen. you will end up getting a faulty or refurbished mobile.
